rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Small foyer connecting the entrance to living spaces and courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space for family activities with views towards the central courtyard, aligning with Vastu principles of light and energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living room, facilitating natural light from courtyard openings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with ample counter space, placed in a southeast corner for positive energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Ground floor bathroom serving visitors and family members with access to the courtyard area.

rooms.name: Store Room
rooms.description: Small storage room integrated within the living space for extra utility.

openings.description: Large window to let in morning light, promoting a healthy ambiance.
Separates the courtyard from interior spaces while allowing light and air circulation.
For additional natural light, following Vastu's emphasis on illumination.
